content:
Data-driven discovery for materials and semiconductors.
We are always interested in hiring talented and driven scientists at any level. If interested we can be reached by the contact form below.

title: Burton Materials Data Lab

summary: The Eastern Young Scholar award is a 3-year early-career fellowship for scientists working in the east of China.
title: Lee Burton wins Eastern Young Scholar Award 2018

summary: The Seal of Excellence award is issued by the European Commission as an endorsement of scientists for future grant applications.
title: Lee Burton wins EU Seal of Excellence award 2017

summary: Lee Burton is the principal investigator of the Materials Data lab.
title: Lee A. Burton
